title: How Has Technology Changed Society? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/31/17
itunes:title: How Has Technology Changed Society? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/31/17
description:
George Noory and New York Times reporter Matt Richtel discuss how rapidly changing technology and the increasingly connected world has altered how we view varied fields like journalism and transportation, and whether we are developing an unhealthy attachment to smartphones and other technology.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
